product_name: Timberland Earthkeeper Front Country Lounger Clogs - Men's
long_description: The leather Timberland Earthkeepers(R) Front Country Lounger Clogs use soft recycled linings and cushioned footbeds for great around-the-house or running-errands comfort. Nubuck leather uppers feature leather from a tannery highly rated for its water-, energy- and waste-management practices by a third-party environmental audit. Slip-on design for easy on and off. Extra-soft linings and footbeds are made from 100% recycled PET plastic; treated to reduce odors. Removable footbeds have shock-absorbing foam and are made specifically for people who spend long days on their feet. Outsoles on the Timberland Earthkeepers Front Country Lounger Clogs are made with 42% recycled rubber.
short_description: The leather Timberland Earthkeepers(R) Front Country Lounger Clogs use soft recycled linings and cushioned footbeds for great around-the-house or running-errands comfort.
